function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of face mask compliance in public places","Impact":"Increased risk of coronavirus transmission in public spaces","Mitigation":"Enforcement of face mask policies, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"CCTV cameras, image processing, automated screening systems","People":"General public, public health authorities, law enforcement","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Use of driverless vehicles for monitoring scenarios across the city","Impact":"Potential lack of human oversight in disease control measures","Mitigation":"Supervised operation of driverless vehicles, regular human review of monitoring data","Technologies":"Driverless vehicle technology, real-time monitoring systems","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"}]}
